message.content:
{"id": "50793", 
"title": "Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch", 
"description": "Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch.", 
"OB": "When the ServletRequestListener is defined, after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST instead of ASYNC.", 
"EB": "When the actual servlet is invoked, the DispatcherType is correctly set to ASYNC. If the listener is intended to be invoked for each dispatch, then the DispatcherType should match the value returned in the filter or servlet.", 
"SR": "The ServletRequestListener should correctly return DispatcherType as ASYNC after dispatch using AsyncContext."}

origin.input_content:

', 'EB': 'When the actual servlet is invoked, the type is correctly set to ASYNC.If the listener is intended to be invoked for each dispatch, then the DispatcherType should match the value returned in the filter/servlet. ', 'SR': ''}
